content: उपशम् {c4c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To become calm or quiet, be assuaged; उपशाम्यतु ते बुद्धिः <ls>Bk. 20. 5.</ls> {@--2@} To cease, stop; अग्निः, शब्दः, कोपः &c.; cease to speak; <ls>K. 110.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To calm, tranquillize. {@--2@} To appease, pacify, assuage, mitigate. {@--3@} To extinguish, kill.
